pkgmetadata.longdescription: R6 Reference Class Based Data Structures // Provides reference classes implementing some useful data structures. The package implements these data structures by using the reference class R6. Therefore, the classes of the data structures are also reference classes which means that their instances are passed by reference. The implemented data structures include stack, queue, double-ended queue, doubly linked list, set, dictionary and binary search tree. See for example https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_structure for more information about the data structures.
